Decision.description: The overall process of making a choice.

Data Acquisition.description: Gathering raw data from various sources.

Data Analysis.description: Analyzing gathered data to identify patterns and insights.

Defining Objectives.description: Clearly defining what needs to be achieved.

Prioritizing Goals.description: Ranking goals based on their significance.

Research.description: Exploring existing knowledge and seeking expert opinions.

Observation.description: Gathering data through direct or indirect observation.

Evaluation.description: Judging the value and relevance of the data.

Specificity.description: Ensuring clear and precise definition of objectives.

Urgency.description: Assessing the time constraints associated with goals.

Importance.description: Determining the strategic importance and value of goals.

Literature Review.description: Reviewing existing literature to inform the decision.

Expert Consultation.description: Consulting experts for guidance and insights.

Indirect Observation.description: Observing events or phenomena through secondary sources.

Conclusion.description: Formulating a final judgment or recommendation.

Assessment.description: Evaluating the positive and negative aspects of the data.

Comparison.description: Comparing the data with alternatives or benchmarks.

Clear Definition.description: Using precise and unambiguous language to define objectives.

Unambiguous Language.description: Ensuring clear and concise communication of objectives.

Quantifiable Metrics.description: Using numerical data to measure progress towards objectives.

Qualitative Indicators.description: Using descriptive data to assess progress towards objectives.

Time Sensitivity.description: Considering the time constraints associated with achieving goals.

Deadline.description: Setting specific deadlines for achieving goals.

Strategic Alignment.description: Aligning goals with the overall strategic direction of the organization.

Value Proposition.description: Assessing the potential benefits and impact of achieving goals.
